count(bf:Work/bf:temporalCoverage[(@rdf:datatype='http://id.loc.gov/datatypes/edtf' or @rdf:datatype='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#date' or @rdf:datatype='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime') and not(contains(.,'X')) and not (contains(.,'/'))]) > 1
